text: Peacock is an American over-the-top subscription video on demand streaming service owned and operated by NBCUniversal, a subsidiary of Comcast. The full service launched on July 15, 2020. Early availability began on April 15, 2020 for Xfinity Flex customers, followed by X1 customers by May 1. ==Original programming== ===Animation=== ====Music==== Title Genre Premiere Seasons Length Status Happy Tree Friends Grunge Pending ==Notes== ==References== Peacock
title: List of Peacock original programming
